Author: lolafienchen
Text: Hey,  try spinach,  egg yolks or just about any greens and vegetables (if you're a meat eater try beef)  for increasing your blood cells which might be a good idea :)   If you eat small portions,  like maybe half a cup or a cup every now and then over the whole day you won't feel too full and thus will not feel too guilty for eating   Otherwise eat for example a salad and drink lots of water so you need to use the toilet more often which makes you feel lighter   Idk if any of this helps but please take care and eat after your blood test!!
